title: My Gran's Apple Pie
ingredients: ['14 heaped tablespoons self raising flour (very heaped spoonfuls)', '150g margarine or butter', '4 tablespoons granulated sugar', '1 large egg mixed in a cup with milk, around 3/4 of a cup of milk', '4-5 apples (Bramley cooking apples are best)', '4 tablespoons granulated sugar']
